data.name: Embrace the puzzle
data.description:
## The task

~~~if:python,javascript,
There is an ascending sequence of integers, the rule for generation of which is unknown. You are asked to guess it, given several first terms in the sample tests. Then, you are asked to write a `generator` for the sequence. It will be tested up to its 100 000<sup>th</sup> term.
~~~
~~~if:haskell,
There is an ascending sequence of integers, the rule for generation of which is unknown. You are asked to guess it, given several first terms in the sample tests. Then, you are asked to define the sequence. It will be tested up to its 100 000<sup>th</sup> term.
~~~

The length of the code must not exceed `5 000` symbols. This is to prevent hardcoding.
